description: Episode number 2 of Series "The Nature of healing". Meditation is an ancient practice used to enhance enlightenment by altering metabolic processes to induce restfulness. Business people, patients and school students, in fact, everyone can benefit from the various therapies shwon if meditation is part of a daily routine.
